caption: Privileges Analysis
description: The Privileges Analysis object is a top-level container for privilege analysis results. It aggregates privilege usage data across cloud services, maps privileges to potential attack techniques, and provides metrics for security assessments.
name: privileges_analysis

total_potential_attacks_count.description: The total count of privileges that map to potential attack techniques.

service_privilege_analyses.description: The list of privilege analysis results grouped by cloud service or namespace.
